newsitem.title: USA: Andrews Group offers to buy Toy Biz shrs.
newsitem.headline: Andrews Group offers to buy Toy Biz shrs.

text.p: Andrews Group said Wednesday it proposed to acquire all the outstanding shares of Toy Biz Inc Class A common stock at a price of $19 per share.
The proposal is based on the expectation that Toy Biz will become a wholly-owned subsidiary of Andrews' subsidiary, Marvel Entertainment Group Inc, the company said.

In October, Andrews said it would buy a 67 percent stake in Toy Biz and, on November 12, the company said it would acquire a 80 percent stake in Marvel, on the condition Toy Biz becomes a Marvel subsidiary.
As of September 30, Toy Biz had about 27.4 million shares outstanding.
